title: 1 Ridza Tsuri
content:
# 1 Ridza Tsuri

Ridza tsuri yevangeri, Murindi wanyewera;Avo vanonzwa masoko, Vapinduke, vapone.CHORUS:Ridzanyi, murindi, ridza, Pasi pese ridzisa;Mwari arikuti, Ridza Vasungwi vaponeswa.Ridza pamakomo ese Mapomo nemikana;Nepanyanza ridzanyizve, Soko rekuponeswa.Ridzanyizve pamagwanza, Nenzvimbo dzine dima;Taura zvakagadzirwa, Baba atidayidza.Ridza kune vakaneta, Vanoda kuponeswa; Muponesi wadayidza, Mwese munodikanwa.

title: 2 Petyo Kana Nepam’suvo

title: 3  Usu Neusu

# 3  Usu Neusu

Apo m’tongi otiyera, Kana takafaniraTichamira sendarama, Kana senhando here?CHORUSTichazoyerwa nem’temo TicharerukaTichazoyerwa naTenzi TicharerukaTonzwa mazwi erufa-ro: "Waita zvakanaka!"Kana mazwi anotyisa; "Hauna kukwanira?"Ngatinzwe mweya mutsvene Apo tichada mutsa,Kana tanonoka Mwa-ri, Anounza magumo?

title: 110 Wakakomborerwa Awo Wanoita
content:
# 110 Wakakomborerwa Awo Wanoita

Inzwa mazwi aMuponesi Ndiwo mazwi eupenyu.Inzwa utondere Jesu akati, "Vakomborerwa vaiti."CHORUSVakakomborerwa vakarurama, komborerwa, komborerwa,Vakakomborerwa vano’ta  m’temo komborerwa, komborerwa.Hakutibatsiri kunzwa kwedu mitemo nezvitsidzo;Kuzvinzwa, kuzviita hakuponesi; Vakomborerwa vanoita.Vanozopinda mumusha vakasunungurwa zviitemaVasukwa, nembiri, zvino narini, Vanodya muti veupenyu.

title: 111 Hakuna Mumwe
content:
# 111 Hakuna Mumwe

Hakuna hama kupinda Jesu, Hakuna, neimwe!Hakuna umwe kurapa vese, Hakuna, neumwe!CHORUSAnoziva nanhamo Jesu, Anotungamira tese,Hakuna umwe kupinda Jesu, Hakuna!neumwe.Hakuna umwe mukuruzveba, Hakuna ne-umwe!Asi Anozviita muduku, Hakuna neumwe!>Hakuna nguva asipo Iye, Hakuna neimwe:Kana usiku rudo ruripo, Hakuna neimwe.Hakuna umwe akamborambwa, Hakuna neimwe! neumwe!Kana munyangadzi ha’murambi, Hakuna!neumwe!Hakuna chipo chikuruzveba, Hakuna nechimwe!Hangatinyimi musha kudenga, Hakuna neumwe!

title: 112 Upenyu Mukutarisa
content:
# 112 Upenyu Mukutarisa

Pamuchinjiko pane upenyu, Jesu Ati, "Nditarise."Pasi nepfuma ngezvenhando, Pamberi ndoona zvakanaka.CHORUSMune u-penyu muku-tarisa muchinjiko.(Upenyu m’kutarisa pam’chinjiko vaKristu,)Upenyu hwakanaka kutarisa Kalvari(Upenyu hwakanaka tarisa paKalvari, pakalvari.)Apo ndakamutarisa Jesu, Iye Akanyemwerera,Kuti ndava mumatambudzo, Muchinjiko unondisimbisa.Ndinozotarisa muchinjiko, Ndosimbira muchinjiko;Hakuna anozoputsika Vanosimbira simba redenga.

title: 113 Achidaidza
content:
# 113 Achidaidza

Jesu arikudanira kumusha, kudana iwe neni,Arindira pamusiwo nemwoyo, Rindira iwe neni.CHORUSUya kum’sha, Imi maneta uya.(Uya) (Kum’sha)Jesu arikumudaidza kwazvo, O munyangadzi uyaMusanonoke achimudaidza Kunyengerera imwi,Ngenyiko tisinganzwi mutsa wake, Mutsa kunewe Nemi.Nguwa irikukasika kupfu’ra Kupfu’ra iwe neni,Bvute, nedima, rufaro zvouya Uya kunewe neniFunga ngerudo akatitsidzira Tsidzira iwe neniKana takatadza \‘nosunungura, Osunungura tese.

title: 114 Zambara Razarurirwa Ini
content:
# 114 Zambara Razarurirwa Ini 

Zambara rakazarurwa Kuti ini ndipinde;Muchinjiko waM’ponesi Tichauona apo.    CHORUSMutsa wakadzama kwazvo kuti andizarurire,Ini...ini...Rasiyirwa ini.(Ini) (ini.)    Zambara rakazarurwa Kuti vese vapone.Vapfumi kana varombo, madzinza kana ndudzi.    Pamberi ngatifambenyi, richakandozarurwa,Gashiranyi rudo Rwake, Chiremba nem’chinjiko.    Hunde mhiriyo kwerwizi Totura muchinjikoTotakura ‘cho-chiremba Toda Mwari kudenga.

title: 115 Murapi Mukuru
content:
# 115 Murapi Mukuru

Murapi m’kuru uripo we mutsa, ndiye Jesu.Anofarisa warombo, Inzwai izvi raJesu.CHORUSZita Rake ritendzwe, Zita rake rikudzweZita Rake riimbwe; Jesu hunde Jesu"Zwitadzo zwa sunungurwa" Inzwai izwi raJesu.Fambanyi naYe kudenga, Tigere’ko naJesu.Mbiri kuNyenye yaMwari, Ndinodawira Jesu, Ndinodisa zita iri raMuponesi Jesu.Zwimwe ndatadza ndinoda Kunzwa zita ra Jesu,Mwoyo wangu wanyaradzwa Ngezita’ro ra Jesu.Apo iye achauya nembiri ne upenyu,Tichafara kutaura ruponeso rwaJesu.

title: 116 Hamuna Nzvimbo YaJesu
content:
# 116 Hamuna Nzvimbo YaJesu

Uzerea ne kunetswa, Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?Wabatwa nemirau, Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?O, Amire pamusiwo, O gugudza-gugudza!Munzwe onyengerera Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?Unopambadza nguwa, Hana basa ra Jesu?Usapambadza Simba, Ha’na basa raJesu?Hauyedzi kukunda, Kana kuwana Mweya;Daidza warasika; Ha’na basa raJesu?Unotswaka upfumi, Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?Usinga bati basa, Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?Rufaro ne upfumi, Ndizvo zviro unoda,Kuyedza kuzvifadza; Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?Watakura zvenhando, Ha’na m’chero va Jesu?Haunaba misumbu, Ha’na m’chero va Jesu?Hauna kana chiro, kuripa basa rako;Hauwani rufaro, Wokumbana na Jesu?

title: 117 Ndirikuuya Tenzi
content:
# 117 Ndirikuuya Tenzi

Ndanzwa izwi renyu, Randidana Tenzi;Ndigeze neropa renyu, RepaKalvari,CHORUSNdouya Tenzi! Uya kunemwi;Ndigezei neropa, RepaKalvari.Handina masimba, Munondisimbisa;Mondigezisa ndichene, Ndichene sechero,Jesu ondidaidza, kune runyararo,Kurudo nerusimbiro, rwepasi nedenga.Rukudzo muropa, Kudzai tsitsi dzake,Kudzai Chipo cha Tenzi, Arisimba Redu.

title: 118 Jesu Akaripa Zwese
content:
# 118 Jesu Akaripa Zwese

Muponesi ati, "Hauna masimba,"Rinda unamate, Ndinokupa zvese.CHORUSJesu M’nunuri, zvese ngezwake,Zvitema zvakatsvuka "zwachena Sechero"Tenzi ndazoona Munesimba rese,Munobvisa hosha ne mwoyo we dombo.Handina kunaka kungadiwa tsitsi,Nguwo ya-ngu ndogeza muropa renyenye.Pachigaro chenyu ndichamiranemi,Ndicha isa zwese pamakumbo Ake.

title: 119 Nanda Rinochenisa
content:
# 119 Nanda Rinochenisa

Ndinoona nanda dzvuku Tsime rakadzama,Jesu Tenzi Muponesi Wakatifirayo.CHORUSTsime iro ndoriwona Iro rinondichenesa;Kudza Tenzi! Rochenesa, Kudza Tenzi rochenesa.Nda wona upenyu hutswa Ndanzwa ropa Rake;Zwitema zwese zwapera Apo patsimero.Ndamuka ndaitwa mutswa Nembiri yedenga;Ne mwoyo nenguwo chenaa Na Kristu mandiriChishamiso tsitsi dzake, Ropa Rake pasi;Muziwenyi Jesu chete wakati nunura.

title: 120 Ndinodayira
content:
# 120 Ndinodayira

Baba ndouya kwamuri; Hakuna umwezwe!Kuti mandisiya ndeda; O ndinoendepi.CHORUSNdodaira iye zvino, Jesu wandifira,Ropa Rake raparara, kuchenesa ini.Mwana wenyu ndom’daira, ndinzwe simba renyu,Zvidiso zvangu zvazadzwa, mune ino nguva.Muvambi verudairo, Ndotarisa imwi,Ndogashira chipo chenyu; Ndiponeswe nacho.

title: 121 Ndichaimba Ne Rudo RwaJesu
content:
# 121 Ndichaimba Ne Rudo RwaJesu

Ndicha i...mbira Jesu Iye wa...kandidisa  (Ndicha-i...)     (Iye wa...)Akari...siyadenga Akafa pa Kari-va-ri  (Akari...)      CHORUSNdoimba...rudo rwaJesu, Ndomuku...dzanarini  (Ndoimba...)       (Ndomuku...)Wakandi...fira ini Ndoimba rudo rwake  (Wakandi...)     Ndisati...ndachema Jesu aka...ndichemera  (Ndisati     Suaka)Ndisati...ndanamata Akandi namatira  (Ndisati)     Okudza...makwerudo Hakuzi...kanwikwese  (Okudza...)	     (Hakuzi...)Kutizwi...tema zvangu Zvacheneswa sechero  (Kutizwi)     Handina...rudo rwaJesu Ndomuku...dza narini  (Handina)   (koaka)Tenzi mwo...yo waneta Ndizadzeyi nerudo  (Tenzimwo)

title: 122 Petyo, Kune Mwi Tenzi
content:
# 122 Petyo, Kune Mwi Tenzi

Petyo, Petyo, ne mwoyo venyu, Ndiswendedze imwi munokoshaNdifungatireyi paditi, Ndiyige muninga, yezororo,Ndiyige "Muninga, yezororo."Petyo, Petyo, handina chiro chemupiro kuna Jesu mambo;Chete mwoyo unechitema, Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu;Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu.Petyo, Petyo, zve kuva wenyu, Ndino siya zvese zvechitemaRufaro rwacho, nekuzvida, Ndipenyi JesuAkarowerwa, Ndipenyi Jesu akarowerwaPetyo, Petyo, ndichikupona, Dakara ndiswike m’mbiriYenyu, Ndinozowa wenyu narini,Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi,Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi

title: 123 Rita Rinoyera
content:
# 123 Rita Rinoyera

Zita rakanakisisa, rinopfuura ese,Rakapiwa naye Baba, Kumu Rubgwana Wake.    CHORUSIro rinoyera; Zita rinoyera (Royera!)(Royera!)Rabva kuna Baba, Ra’ya pasiRauya ne ngirosi; Ra’ya pausiku (Royera) (Royera)Zita ra Tenzi Jesu.    Rounza chikomborero, Ndoimba ndichifara,Zita Rake ndoribvuma, Ndichazoriparidza.    Nyaya yerusununguro nerudo ndichaimbaNdichazo rikudza zita rinopfuura ese.

title: 124 Kwete Ini Asi Kristu
content:
# 124 Kwete Ini Asi Kristu

Kwete ini Asi kudzai Kristu;Asi Kristu Azihwe akudzwe:Kristu chete mubasa redu rese;Kristu basi mukufunga kwese.Kwete ini Anonyaradza,NdiKri-stu A-nobvisa masodzi;NdiKri-stu A-nosimudza mutoro;Ndiye Kristu Anodzinga kutya;Kristu basi ha’tauri zwenhando;Kristu basi Asina nyongano:Kristu basi Asingazwi kudzi ba;Kristu basi Ini ndisa onwe.Handi-ni-ndi Kristu A ndipa zwese;Handini ndi-Kristu \‘andipa simba;Kristu chete Asimbisa muwiri,Kristu chete, Dakara narini.

title: 125 Kujeka Mumwoyo
content:
# 125 Kujeka Mumwoyo

Kune kupenya mugomo, nekupenya munyanza,Nemaranzi anogara Munzwimbo dzakanaka,Mukati memwoyo wangu mazadzwa nekujeka,Apo pana Muponesi pano jekesa kwese.    CHORUSO! kupenya kwakanaka kupenyera mu mwoyo,Jesu ano bvisa nhamo anopenya mumwoyo.    Ndosiya kusuwa kwangu Senguwadzo dzekare;Ndifukidze nekutenda mundipenyikutenda.Kumusha wembiri uyo makandigadzirira;Mwoyo wangu unotenda ne mweya unobvuma.    Muponesi manditenga ndawawenyu narini;Ngayipfute mwenje yese ipfutire iye Tenzi.Kumusha wembiri uyo makandigadzirira;Mwoyo wangu uno tenda nemweya unobvuma.

title: 126 Sezwo Ndaponeswa
content:
# 126 Sezwo Ndaponeswa

Ndine ngoma yandinoda sezwo ndaponeswa;Yamununuri naMambo Sezwo ndaponeswa.    CHORUSSezwo-ndaponeswa, Sezwo ndaponeswaNdokudza Muponesi, Sezwo ndaponeswa,Ndokudza zita raM’ponesi    Ndina Kristu Oyerisa sezwo ndaponeswa.Rudo rwake ndurudisa sezwo ndaponeswa.    Ndine mbowo yakanaka sezwo ndaponeswa.Anodzinga kutya kwese Sezwo ndaponeswa.    Andi gadzirira musha sezwo ndaponeswa,Kwandicha gara narini sezwo ndaponeswa.

title: 127 Anoda Zwe Ini
content:
# 127 Anoda Zwe Ini

Mwari avona kashiri kaputsika pasi;Kuti achida kashiri Anodazve ini.    CHORUSAnondida, anondida, anondida ini,Anoda zviduku zvese, anodazve ini.    Anogadzira maruva akanaka kwazvo;Kuti anoda maruva anodazve ini.    Mwari wakasika zvese, shiri ne maruva,Haachakanganwi tupwere, Twese anotuda.

title: 128 Yakakomborerwa Nguwa Yemunamato
content:
# 128 Yakakomborerwa Nguwa Yemunamato

Nguwa yekunamata mwoyo uno pfawaTouya kuna Jesu M’ponesi weduNekutenda touya, Kuchishangu cheduOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo    CHORUSMukunamata TinokomborerwaOrapa wakaneta Zvakanaka kuwayo.    Nguwa yekunamata, Tenzi oswederaAne tsitsi kunzwa vana vachichemaZvese tinozviisa pamakumbo akeOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo    Nguwa yekunamata, apo vano yedzwaToisa kuna Tenzi anobatsiraNemwoyo wekunzwira obvisa zvinetsoOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo.    Panguwa yem’namato TinomusimbiraZwikomborero zwese tinozwiwana;Mukusimbira iye hakuna dambudzoOrapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo.

title: 129 Jesu Huya Utikomborere
content:
# 129 Jesu Huya Utikomborere

Jesu imi mati "Pakaungana, Wawiri, watatu, munozowapo"Tinomudaira, Tomunamata; Jesu uyai muzotikomborera.CHORUSJesu u-ya uzo tikombo-rere Je-su kombo-rera, Ugare petyo.Je-su makasangana nesu kare Asi iwa ne-su nekumagumoUya Muponesi, mutipe tsitsi; Tenzi tigashire; tino namata.Ita mazwi edu amuimbire Inzwa zvikumbiro zvedu kunemwi;Simbisa rudairo rwedu kunemwi, Chenesai rudo nzira ijeke.

title: 130 ’Ndiri Wenyu Tenzi’
content:
# 130 ’Ndiri Wenyu Tenzi’

Ndiri wenyu Tenzi, Ndanzwa Izwi, Rataura nerudo,Ndinoda kusimba murudairo. Ndiwe petyo nemwi.    CHORUSNdipfuwe-nyi Petyo naTenzi: (Pe-tyo pe-tyo)Petyo nemuchinjiko. Ndipfuwenyi ndiwePetyo naTenzi, Petyo nedivi renyu.    Ndipirenyi kubasaro renyu, nesimbaro retsitsiMweya wangu utarise imwi, nerudo ruwe rwenyu.    Ndine rufaro Tenzi panguva ndiri-pamberi penyu,Ndichipfugama nemwizve Mwari Tichitaurirana.    Kune rudo rwondisingazivi, Dakara ndiswikeko;Rufaro rwo-ndisingasvikiri, Dakara ndiwe nemwi.

title: 131 Ndifanane NaJesu
content:
# 131 Ndifanane NaJesu

 Ngandifane naJesuAve Mponesi wanguNdizadzenyi nerudoNdipfawire senjiwaNgandifambe saJesuMurwendo rweripasiNdiri murombo m’mweyoGarai neni Mponesi     Kana achinzwa shiriDzimwe dzichiputsika Adzi itire mutsaNgeidi anondinzwa woAnonditungamirira Nekundiregerera Ngandi itwe mutsweneGarai neni M’ponesi    Ngandifane naJesuMukurarama kwanguNdizorore kunemwiPanzwimbo inyerereNdibarwe patsva iniNerudo rwake JesuNgandiwe nerutendoGarai neni M’ponesi

title: 132 Petyo Ne Muchinjiko
content:
# 132 Petyo Ne Muchinjiko

Petyo nemuchinjikoPane tsime kwaroMvura yekurapaYabva kuna Jesu    CHORUSPetyo, Petyo nem’chinjiko wenyuNdipo panozororaMwoyo wangu wese     Petyo nemuchinjikoMutsa wandiwanaApo ndajekeserwaKupenya kwaJesu     Petyo nemuchinjikoNdonuona Jesu   Ndibatsire kufamba Mumabvute awo    Petyo nemuchinjikoNdorinda ndowimbaDakara ndizoswikaMhiriyo kwerizi

title: 133 Kufamba NaMwari
content:
# 133 Kufamba NaMwari

O bvumai ndifambe nemwiSezvakaita InokiMubate ruwoko rwangu Nditaurirane nemwiKana nzira yoshayikwa Ndibvumei ndifambe nemwi    Handingambo fambi ndega Dutu ririkuvuvutaMirawu yakateiwa Wawengi wanondi yedzaEse aya matambudzo Tenzi bvumai ndifambe nemi     Kuti mandipa zororoZvepasi zvinova nhandoNdozofamba neku-shingaNdotakura muchinjikoDakara ndione ZioniTenzi bvumai ndifambe nemi

title: 134 Rudo Runoshamisa Rwa Jesu
content:
# 134 Rudo Runoshamisa Rwa Jesu

 Panzwimbo yakakwiriraMwoyo wangu unotendaNdiyani angatsananguraNeurwu rudo rwaJesu    CHORUSRwoshamisa, Rwoshamisa, Ururudo rwaJesuRunotishamisa isu, Ururudo rwaJesu    Rufaro pamasikatiNerujeko panedimaMushonga mudambudzo Irwo rudo rwo rwaJesu    Tariro yesununguroMubatsiri ndaputsikaMuupenyu nemukufaNdirwo uru rudo rwaJesu

title: 135 Ndinomuda Kwazvo
content:
# 135 Ndinomuda Kwazvo

 Ndinomuda kwazvoTenzi kune zviro zveseMakandipa runyararoRusingaparadzwi    CHORUSHazvisati zvataurwa, Zverudo rukuruHazvisati zvataurwa, Ropa racheniswa    Ndinoziva muripetyoKunepasi rino Ndofunga imwi cheteKune ipi ngoma   Imwi mandisununguraNgandifarisiseNdisinaba rudo rwenyu Ini ndinga tsamwa   Tenzi wangu anokoshaNdomuitirenyiKuti nzira yakanakaNdozofamba nemwi

title: 136 Ndotondera Kalvari
content:
# 136 Ndotondera Kalvari

 Ndomutewera kwesekoNdadzidza kumusimbiraNdotondera kundifiraPam’chinjiko we Kalvari   CHORUSJesu anditungamira, M’rwendo rweseNguva dzese, Ari shamwari yeidiNdinotondera Kalvari    Ndofarira m’temo wakeNdoda anditungamireRudo rwake rwakanakaRwayerera paKalvari    Ndinofamba ndisingatyiNdofara naKristu petyoNdosimbira ndichaonaShamwari ye paKalvari

title: 137 Tora Hako Pasi
content:
# 137 Tora Hako Pasi

Ungatore hako pasiNerufaro rwaro rweseAsi ndipe hangu JesuAnogara narini   CHORUSTsitsi dzake dzakadzama, Nerudorwo rukuruRununuro rwakakomba, Chitsidzo che upenyu    Ungatora hako pasiUndipe hangu JesuAnondi nyaradza mweyaNaya ndinozoimba   Ungatora hako pasiUndipe hangu Jesu Ndione kufara kwakeKondifadza munzira    Ungatora hako pasiUndipe hangu JesuNdinosimbira m’chinjikoDakara ndimuone

title: 138 Kuzvipira Kuna Jesu
content:
# 138 Kuzvipira Kuna Jesu

Tora upenyu hwanguHuzvipire kunemwiTora mawoko anguAyite rudo rwako   CHORUSNdisambe ngeropa reNyenyeNdasambwa, ndachena secheroTenzi ndomupa upenyu nezveseNdiwe wenyu narini   Tora makumbo anguAmuitore basa Tora izwi ndiimbeKunemwi nguva dzose    Tora muromo wangu Uta’re soko renyuTora upfumi hwanguNdisasare nechiro   Tora nguva dzanguDzimukudze nariniToranyi pfungwa dzanguMudziitise basa   Tora zvidiso zvanguZviite zviwe zvenyuToranyi mwoyo wanguUwe chigaro chenyu    Toranyi rudo rwanguTenzi ndinozvi piraTora huini hwanguHuwe hwenyu narini

content:
# 139 Ndawana Shamwari

 Ndawana shamwariYakandida ndisingaziviAkandipfuwa nerudoAkandisunga kwa’riMwoyo wangu wasungwaNepfundo-ro rakasimbaJesu ndiri wako iniUriwangu narini      Ndawana shamwari\‘Yoshamwari yakandifiraHandi upenyuba cheteAsi akazvipiraZwe ndinazvo handizvanguNdakamuchengeteraMwoyo, simba, upenyu zveseNgezvake narini    Ndawana shamwariAkapiwa masimba eseKundichengeta munziraInoyenda kudengaMbiri iri kupenyayoKuti indisimbiseNgandirinde ndisewenzePamberi ndozorora    Ndawana shamwariInemutsa idi nerudoNdimutungamiri kwaye Anenzero nesimba Kuna iye anondidaNdinowana masimbaKorufo rungakurira?Ndiri wenyu narini

content:
# 140 Izwi Ra Jesu

Ndanzwa izwi  Jesu Ati Uya uzorore Iwe waneta    Urarepo paditi panguNdauya ndaneta     Ini Tenzi ndakasuwaNdawana zororo   Rino-fadza kuna iye         Ndanzwa izwi   Jesu Ati, Ona ndinokupa Chimwa mvura yeupenyu    Kuti urarame  Ndauya ndamwa kunaIyeMvura yeupenyu  Nyota yapera ndaponaKuna’ye M’ponesi      Ndanzwa izwi,  Jesu Ati, ndini mwenje wenyu Nditarise kwakuyedza  NdichakupenyeraNdawona nyenyedzi Nemwedzi kuna Jesu Ndichafara mukujeka Ndipedzise rwendo

content:
# 141 Ndiri Wenyu

Ndinoda kuwawenyuTenzi ndidzidzisenyizveNdoita rudo rwenyuTenzi Ndibatsirenyi CHORUSNdiriwe…nyu Tenzi,Ngeidi ndiri wenyuNdinotsi…dza Tenzi,Tenzi ndiri wenyu’di    Chinyi rufaro neupfumiImwi musipozveNdinosiya zvese zvepasiNdiwane zvenyu    Ndosiya rufaro rwenyikaUyanyi kuneniNdinozoperera kunemwiMundinyaradze

content:
# 142 Kunakayi!

Zuva rakanakisa Rakapinda eseTotorasa pfungwa dzenyikaTofunga naMwariMazwi erudo akanakaKubva kuna IyeKu’nza masodzi enhamoOt’svitsa kudengaKuti tidzinge zvitemaTayedza tatadzaIye anoona mwoyoAnotibatsira

content:
# 143 Tenzi Tipatsanisenyi Ne Chikomborero Chenyu

Tenzi tipatsanisenyiNechikomborero zveTipe rufaro nefaroTikurire netsitsiOtipenyi masimbawoTichafamba mugwenga    Tomutenda nekukudzaNeinzwi revhangeriMichero yeinzwi renyuIzadze mwoyo yeduTivimbike nguva dzeseTiwanikwe muidi    Achakavanda mazuvaNgati ape kwa MuriNgatishinge misi yeseTitize tisaneteKudakare tigoonaMbiri yenyu kudenga

title: 144 Panzwimbo yakakwirira
content:
# 144 Panzwimbo yakakwirira

Ndiri kukwira munziraYekudenga misi yeseNdichi namata munziraTenzi ndikwidzei kudenga     CHORUSNdisimudzenyi ndimiseyi,Nerudawiro kudengaPanzwimbo yakakwirira,Tenzi ndimise kudenga    Handidi zvangu kugaraApo pane kupokanaAsi vamwe vangagaraTenzi ndimise kudenga    Ndoda kugara kudengaKana Satan’ AndinetsaRudairo rwangu rweseNgerwe kugara kudenga    Ndoda kukwira kum’soroNdione kupenya kwenyuNdino namatira kutiTenzi ndiise kum’soro

title: 145 Usakumbire Kuregererwa
content:
# 145 Usakumbire Kuregererwa

Usade kuregererwa kune basaMira usewenze, kwese ungaisweKukona kwake kuri kupiwa iweGashira uwane basa rekudenga    CHORUSO huya… usawe senyope,O huya… mirausewenze; Usade kuregererwaUngazonzwi achiti kunewe, hauchina basa    Usade kuregererwa, wadaidzwaChikasika iwe kuita basaroMinda yatoibva vacheki vashomaFarira kuita basa rake Tenzi    Usade kuregererwaKunengozi mukunonoka kuita basa rakeUchinyengererwa neinzwi raTenziJesu anemutsa uya uponeswe

title: 146 Upenyu Hwenyu Kuneni
